com.logituit.logixsdk.logixplayer.core

Class LogixPlayerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logituit.logixsdk.logixplayer.core.LogixPlayerImpl

  • public class LogixPlayerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as implementation for LogixPlayer initializing the player and deals with player interaction

    • Constructor Detail

      • LogixPlayerImpl

        public LogixPlayerImpl(android.content.Context context,
                       LogixPlayerView playerView,
                       LogixPlayerEventListener logixPlayerEventListener,
                       LogixAdEventListener logixAdEventListener)
        Parameters:
        context - A Context
        playerView - The LogixPlayerView will be used as playerView for playing videos
        logixPlayerEventListener - The LogixPlayerEventListener will listen to the events occuring on the playerView like showing-hiding video controllers,full screen mode, initializing player
        logixAdEventListener - The LogixAdEventListener will listen to the events related to ads

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.net.Uri[] uris,
                       boolean autoPlay,
                       int startWindow,
                       android.view.ViewGroup mCompanionViewGroup)
        This method initializes the player with Uris of the videos of the playlist to be played
        Parameters:
        uris - A Uri is an array of multiple Uris of the videos to be played
        autoPlay - A boolean stating auto-play state of video player
        startWindow - This is the starting index of window

                       boolean autoPlay,

        Parameters:
        uris - A Uri is an array of multiple Uris of the videos of the playlist to be played
        extensions - This is an array of extensions of the videos of the playlist to be played
        autoPlay - A boolean stating auto-play state of video player

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.net.Uri[] uris,
                       java.lang.String[] extensions,
                       boolean autoPlay,
                       int startWindow,
                       long startPosition,
                       java.lang.String abrAlgorithm,
                       boolean preferExtensionDecoders,
                       java.lang.String adUrl,
                       android.view.ViewGroup mCompanionViewGroup)
        This method is called in onStart of activity when SDK level is > 23, in onResume when SDK level is <= 23, while requesting permissions, and onPlayerError
        Parameters:
        uris - A Uri is an array of multiple Uris of the videos to be played
        extensions - This is an array of extensions of the videos to be played
        autoPlay - A boolean stating auto-play state of video player
        startWindow - This is the starting index of window
        startPosition - This is the start position of the video
        abrAlgorithm - This specifies abr alogrith to use
        preferExtensionDecoders - This is boolean value stating whether user wants extension decoders
        adUrl - This is string ad Tag Url

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.net.Uri[] uris,
                       java.lang.String[] extensions,
                       boolean autoPlay,
                       int startWindow,
                       long startPosition,
                       java.lang.String abrAlgorithm,
                       boolean preferExtensionDecoders,
                       java.lang.String adUrl,
                       com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.ImaSdkSettings imaSdkSettings,
                       int maxBitrateForAds,
                       android.view.ViewGroup mCompanionViewGroup)
        This method initializes player,trackselector,logixAdsController,sets media source for the videoPlayer and prepares the player
        Parameters:
        uris - A Uri is an array of Uris of the videos to be played
        extensions - This is an array of extensions of the videos to be played
        autoPlay - A boolean stating auto-play state of video player
        startWindow - This is the starting index of window
        startPosition - This is the start position of the video
        abrAlgorithm - This specifies abr alogrith to use
        preferExtensionDecoders - This is boolean value stating whether user wants extension decoders
        adUrl - This is string ad Tag Url
        imaSdkSettings - A ImaSdkSettings for imaSdkSettings
        maxBitrateForAds - Maximum bite rate for ads to be played

        Parameters:

        This method is to be called in onStart() of Activity when SDK level is > 23 and in onResume() when SDK level is <= 23 resumes the view state of player, to be called from onResume() of activity

        Parameters:
        drmLicenseUrl - : url containing drm license
        drmSchemeExtra - schema of drm

      • setDrmSessionManager

        public void setDrmSessionManager(java.lang.String drmLicenseUrl,
                                 java.lang.String[] keyRequestPropertiesArray,
                                 boolean multiSession,
                                 java.lang.String drmSchemeExtra)
        sets the drm session for the video/s to be played.
        Parameters:
        drmLicenseUrl - : url containing drm license
        keyRequestPropertiesArray - An array of key request properties
        multiSession - A boolean that specify whether multiple key session support is enabled. * * Default is false.
        drmSchemeExtra - schema of drm

      • addVideo

        public void addVideo(android.net.Uri uri,
                     java.lang.String extension)
        This method adds Video to the current playing playlist and prepares player
        Parameters:
        uri - A Uri of Video to add in playlist
        extension - Extension of the Video, can be null if url already contains .ext

                      java.lang.String[] extensions)

        Parameters:
        uris - A Uri array of Videos to add in playlist
        extensions - AN array of Extensions of the Videos, can be null if urls contain .ext

      • addVideos

        public void addVideos(int index,
                      android.net.Uri[] uris,
                      java.lang.String[] extensions)
        This method adds Videos to the playlist at a particular index and prepares player
        Parameters:
        index - This is the index where MediaSource will be inserted
        uris - A Uri array of Videos to add in playlist
        extensions - extensions AN array of Extensions of the Videos, can be null

      • setSphericalStereoMode

        public void setSphericalStereoMode(java.lang.String sphericalStereoMode)
        THis method is called on creation of PlayerActivity Sets specified Spherical Stereo Mode for the player refer SPHERICAL_STEREO_MODE_MONO, SPHERICAL_STEREO_MODE_TOP_BOTTOM, SPHERICAL_STEREO_MODE_LEFT_RIGHT
        Parameters:
        sphericalStereoMode - Spherical Stereo Mode

      • releaseAdsLoader

        public void releaseAdsLoader(LogixPlayerView logixPlayerView)
        This method releases AdLoader This method is to be called while creating onNewIntent(),destroying an activity ie. onDestroy(), when SDK level is <= 23 in onPause and when SDK level is > 23 in onStop
        Parameters:
        logixPlayerView - A LogixPlayerView whose adLoader is to be removed
